> Syntax is really simple
I always thought so too but recently I found that this seems to depend on your previous experience with programming languages.

The new <http://exercism.io|exercism.io> tooling is being rewritten in Nim rather than Go and part of the reason is that a lot of people said they were unable to read Go syntax well enough to debug the tools as occasional users.
